EmailTemplate.name: CSM HHP PRO Denied Template
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you for your inquiry to purchase the Service Plus Pro version of INSITE
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello, Thanks for your inquiry to purchase the Service Plus Pro version of INSITE.
Service Plus Pro is reserved for Cummins certified distributors and Approved Cummins Certified HHP (High Horsepower) Dealers only.
In the past yearsâ€™ Service Plus Pro INSITE was given in error. The only Service Plus access we can offer at this time is Service Plus Lite.
This auto-generated e-mail was sent from Cummins.
